DOC.brief_title: Robotic Versus Abdominal Surgery Endometrial Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Hypothesis : Robotic assist laparoscopy ( RAL ) equal term oncologic surgical safety conventional abdominal surgery ( AS ) high risk endometrial cancer ( EC ) . Methods : Women high risk EC ( define high grade endometrial , clear cell serous ) randomize either RAL AS . Both group undergo complete surgical staging ( hysterectomy , bilateral salpingoophorectomy , pelvic paraaortal lymphadenectomy ) Primary endpoint : Number harvest lymph node per station Secondary endpoint : Recurrences 3 year surgery . Lymphatic side-effects , quality life , cost , surgical morbidity .
